mapper.select: select board_hits, (select count(*) from b_reply where b_reply_no = board_seq_no) as b_reply_count, a.* from (select ROWNUM as RNUM, b.* from (select * from board where board_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or board_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by board_seq_no desc) b )a where a.RNUM>=#{start} and a.RNUM<=#{end}
mapper.update: update board set board_hits=board_hits+1 where board_seq_no=#{board_seq_no}
update board set board_title=#{board_title}, board_image=#{board_image}, board_content=#{board_content} where board_seq_no=#{board_seq_no}
mapper.select: select b.b_reply_seq_no, m.member_nickname, b.b_reply_content, b.reg_date from member m, b_reply b where m.member_no=b.member_no and b.b_reply_no=#{board_seq_no} order by b.reg_date desc
